results.title: The Cultural Revolution
results.creator_credit: Melbourne State College. Media Production Centre and Myra Roper
results.brief_description: The film contains footage of both city and Peasant Chinese during the Cultural Revolution beginning 1966. Gives some background to the movement and compares Mao’s comment that it was 70% good and 30% bad with a current Chinese assessment that it was a 10 year reversal of the Chinese socialist cause.

results.title: The Culinary art of Japan
results.brief_description: Japanese cooking is unique. It is based on seasonal culinary specialities, the preparation and serving of which is considered to be an art. Shows the buying of fresh fish and vegetables, the tea ceremony, a traditional dinner, cooking schools, family meals and the preparation of sukiyaki, tempura and sushi.

results.title: The Culbin story
results.creator_credit: I Anderson, Forestry Commission of Scotland and E Marquis
results.brief_description: Records the Forestry Commission’s achievements at afforestation on the sandy southern shore of Moray Firth, Scotland. This area was completely buried by sand in the late 17th century. In 1921 the Forestry Commission began their work by introducing marram grass to bind the sand. This proved unsuccessful so a thatched cover of brushwood was laid over the sand. Now nearly the whole area has been planted with Corsican pine which is proving effective in checking sand drifts.
results.creator_credit_for_label: I Anderson, Forestry Commission of Scotland and E Marquis

results.title: The Cuckoo = Le Coucou
results.creator_credit: Les Cineastes Animaliers Associes, Francois Bel and Gerard Vienne
results.brief_description: A study of the parasitic reproduction of the cuckoo. The cuckoo does not build itself a nest, but lays its eggs in other bird’s nests and leaves them to hatch and rear its young. However, there are hazards associated with parasitic reproduction; barely ten percent of young cuckoos attain their full growth. Uses natural sound only.

results.title: The Cubbies
results.creator_credit: Ron Saunders, South Australian Film Corporation and David Woodgate
results.brief_description: Features an adventure playground which allows children to play on their own terms, and enables creative expression. Through the eyes of Joan Healy, Supervisor of the Fitzroy Adventure Playground (South Australia), the film takes a candid look at the children and their projects.

results.title: The Cub scout in the pack
results.creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
results.brief_description: The film illustrates a typical Cub Pack theme, in this case a circus, from beginning to end. Emphasis is placed in the part played by the Cub-master, Den Mothers, Den Dads, Den Chief, parents and Cub Scouts.

results.title: The Cub scout in the den
results.creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
results.brief_description: Shows a typical cub Den in operation including the procedure of a Den meeting. Illustrates the roles played by Den Mother, Den Dad, Den Chief and Denner. Shows how the monthly theme is worked into the Den meeting program and how typical “disciplinary” problems are correctly handled.

results.title: The CSL veterinary story
results.creator_credit: Commonwealth Serum Laboratories (Australia) and Barry Scott
results.brief_description: Manufacture of vaccines at the Commonwealth Serum Laboratories; field stations where animals are kept for the preparation and testing of vaccines; production of penicillin, Salk vaccine and Pulpy Kidney vaccine at the laboratories at Parkville. Over 600 valuable and life-saving products are made to which rigid standards of research and production are applied.
results.description: Manufacture of vaccines at the Commonwealth Serum Laboratories; field stations where animals are kept for the preparation and testing of vaccines; production of penicillin, Salk vaccine and Pulpy Kidney vaccine at the laboratories at Parkville. Over 600 valuable and life-saving products are made to which rigid standards of research and production are applied.

results.title: The Crystal space/time ship
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “The Infinity series”.
Using computer generated graphics and astrophotography, this virtually wordless video, explores the wonders of the universe, beginning at Mercury and journeying ever outwards into the outermost reaches of space/time.
